name: Red V.s Blue 3
description:
Red v.s Blue 3 is a game where you and a friend break blocks, trying to make the other player fall!

RED CONTROLS:
A - Left
D - Right
S - Powerup

BLUE CONTROLS:
Left Arrow - Left
Right Arrow - Right
Down Arrow - Powerup

Scratch Version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/396903710
